Headline: No trains between O'Hare and Damen
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Damen due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Damen due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between Forest Park and Damen at this time.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include the #56 Milwaukee bus.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
